Note  - anterior/posterior view options depend on recent pull request https://github.com/nilearn/nilearn/pull/1421 

At the moment this matches the functionality of plot_surf. A few further tweaks still needed to additionally work fully with plot_surf_roi and plot_surf_stat_map
title: added bihemispheric plotting function
